extendedInfo.description: Easy Calendar is a free calendar app which designed for android phones and tablets.It syncs automatically to your android calendar which syncs with Google Calendar.It is designed for quick , easy and business work with your calendars.You can design your schedule with your amazing backgrounds, apply many Themes, choose different colors for calendars,customize the views with shape and stroke, change the font size and add images to events.Easy Calendar includes a beautiful Month Widget, which will help you manage your calendars with ease from your homescreen.It is possible to recover events that were deleted recently.You can share your Events and Calendar as images or as text ( Easy Calendar + ) with your friends to Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Gmail, Notes and more.Easy Calendar can be used as a Tasker \ Scheduler to manage your tasks and time efficiently.With 4 different Calendar views you can manage your daily / weekly / monthly schedule with ease.Easy Calendar has its own Reminders / Alarms system. You can set one reminder or more to a single event, or turn off the reminders system.Reccur events are supported. Thus, you can manage your Timetable / Schedule with this application or with the Widget .Easy Calendar + include 4 extra business themes , designed Calculator , Silent Mode for Events / Tasks , Search for tasks and sharing you schedule as text to Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Gmail, Notes and more.Features:-------------- Syncs automatically to your android calendar which syncs with Google Calendar .- 7 Colorful Themes ( 11 in Easy Calendar + ) - Easy, Nature, Rose, Sea, Desert, Random, Strawberry, Wood, Sky, Garden.- Choose image for background .- Change the text size,  shape and stroke of the task \ tasks .- Choose different color for each Calendar.- Tasks \ Events are Expandable .- 4 Unique Calendar views to show your schedule : Swipe Day ( Agenda ) view, Week view, Month view and Full Month .- Share your Events and Calendar as image to Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Gmail, Notes and more .- Alarms \ Reminders Managing System .- Support recurring events - can help creating Timetable .- Edit All instances \ Specific Instance of recurring event .- Recover deleted Events \ Tasks .- Return to today's date by long clicking on the upper date .- Pinch - Zoom in day view to show more \ less days .- Watch multiple Events by expanding them.- Recover Events that were deleted in the current run of the app .- Choose which Calendars are visible .- Handy Month Widget .- Change the week start day .- Support Many Languages .- Business design that supports tablets .Easy Calendar + Features:---------------------------------------- 4 extra business themes .- Designed & Clear Calculator .- Silent Mode for Events / Tasks (When the event begins, your phone will turn to silent mode) .- Search for Events / Tasks . - Sharing you schedule as text to Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Gmail, Notes and more . - No Ad when sharing full schedule .Support:------------If you liked Easy Calendar, please show us you support and rate, comment or recommend it to your friends.Updates:-------------We will do our best to keep updating Easy Calendar and fix any bugs.The app will remain free . Easy Calendar + will add Extra & Great features.APP2SD:--------------app2SD can not be supported. Because of android limitation,  homescreen widgets don't work from SD.contact us: calendeasy@gmail.com .
